content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I try to control everything. I feel so nervous if I lose control of everyone and everything in my life.
So, you feel like you are losing control of everything in your life? Is that right?
Recently true. I feel so down when I found I forgot somehting important to do.
I understand that feeling can be a bit overwhelming. I know how hard it can be to find the things you need in life to take control.
